entries: 当你在进行查尔纳之触的攻击时，消耗20点或更多点数，目标必须对你的法术救赎DC进行宪法救赎成功，否则会被木乃伊腐烂诅咒。被诅咒的目标无法恢复命中率，而且每过24小时，其最大命中率会减少10（（%0%））。如果诅咒将目标的最大命中率降低到0，目标就会死亡，其身体会变成灰尘。诅咒持续到被{@spell remove curse}法术或其他魔法移除为止。

entries.name: Whirlwind of Sand
entries: 作为一个动作，你可以神奇地变成一股沙旋风，最多移动60英尺，然后恢复到你的正常形态。在旋风状态下，你对所有伤害免疫，不能被{@condition grappled}、{@condition petrified}、{@condition prone}、{@condition restrained}或{@condition stunned}击倒。你所穿戴或携带的装备仍然在你手中。

subclassFeature.name: Plague Lord
entries: 瘟疫的力量是不可否认的。单一的疾病可以单枪匹马地压倒一个国家，甚至是一个帝国。意识到疾病潜力的死灵法师们通常会寻求自己挥舞这种力量。这些人被称为瘟疫领主，是害虫和疾病的指挥者。瘟疫领主的触摸是有毒的，害虫保护他们不受伤害，可以通过非常规的方式转移他们的法术，并将他们的污秽传播给他们的臣民。

subclassFeature.name: Charnel Toxin
entries: 在3级时，即使是你的触摸也能引起疾病。当你在进行查尔纳之触的攻击时，消耗10点或更多的点数，目标必须对你的法术救赎DC进行宪法救赎成功，否则会被（%0%），直到你下一个回合开始。

subclassFeature.name: Vile Congregation
entries: 从第3级开始，虫群会附着在你的皮肤上，并蜂拥而上，包围附近的其他人。每当你周围5英尺内的生物进行攻击卷或蓄力投掷时，你可以滚动（%0%）并从其攻击卷或蓄力投掷中减去结果。这个能力对结构体和亡灵没有影响。

subclassFeature.name: Projectile Spew
entries: 从第6级开始，你自己内心的力量结点已经变成了一种不稳定的疾病鸡尾酒，使你的法术有了更大的影响力。你可以用你的 "查尔纳之触 "功能和范围为 "触 "的法术接触到15英尺以外的生物，因为你用被注入魔法的弹射性呕吐物来传递你的载荷。

subclassFeature.name: Bloated Thralls
entries: 在10级的时候，你的傀儡已经变成了害虫和疾病的巢穴，随时都可以爆发。当一个傀儡的生命值下降到0或者你释放它的时候，你可以选择让它在一场毒药、血肉和害虫的雨中爆炸。除了你自己和你的其他傀儡之外，每个在傀儡5英尺范围内的生物都必须对你的法术救赎进行一次灵巧的救赎。如果救赎失败，生物会受到{@dice 4d6}的毒药伤害，并且在你下一个回合开始前会被{@condition poisoned}。拯救成功时，生物不会受到{@condition poisoned}的伤害，并受到一半的伤害。

subclassFeature.name: Lichdom: Corpulent Lich
entries: 在20级时，你已经达到了死灵法术的巅峰，并将自己转化为一个巫师。你对疾病和腐烂的痴迷影响了你的转变：你的身体会膨胀，很像一具积水的尸体，而你的皮肤会变成病态的绿色。除了Lichdom特征外，你还获得了以下特征。

entries.name: Gore Burst
entries: 当你的生命值下降到0时，你的身体会在瘟疫和亡灵能量的喷洒中爆炸。在以你为中心的20英尺范围内的每个生物都必须对你的法术救赎DC做出灵巧的救赎。如果救赎失败，生物会受到{@dice 5d10}坏死伤害和{@dice 5d10}中毒伤害，并且在你下一回合开始前会被{@condition poisoned}。如果救赎成功，生物就不会中毒，并受到一半的伤害。

entries.name: Master of Disease
entries: 当你使用你的查尔纳毒素能力，并从你的查尔纳之触池中消耗25点或更多的点数时，目标生物在救治失败的情况下会受到（%0%）的伤害，持续时间长达1分钟。此外，你还可以应用你选择的以下两个效果，在生物中毒时影响它。

items: 选择一个能力得分。目标在使用该能力分进行能力检查和蓄力投掷时处于劣势。
该生物只能看到半径为10英尺的范围。
该生物在其每个回合结束时都会下降（%0%）。
每当该生物受到伤害时，就会失去额外的{@dice 1d6}命中点。
该生物只能在{@condition poisoned}时用咿咿呀呀的无稽之谈说话，而且不能执行法术的言语部分。

entries: 在它的每个回合结束时，该生物可以对你的法术救赎DC进行宪法救赎，如果成功则结束这个效果。

subclassFeature.name: Reanimator
entries: 通过冒泡的试管和闪光的电极，你已经发现了亡灵魔法的真正核心：疯狂的科学。你在外科、炼金术和物理学方面进行了意义深远的实验，用你的动画奴仆作为可怕的试验品和行走的手术假人。最关键的是，你发现雷电几乎可以赋予任何东西以生命的模样，从最小的切断的肌肉到最高大的、没有灵魂的巨兽。

subclassFeature.name: Skilled Surgeon
entries: 从你在3级时选择这个志向开始，你获得了对（%0%）技能的熟练度，如果你之前没有的话。你可以使用你的智力，而不是智慧，进行智慧（医学）检查。

subclassFeature.name: Mad Science
entries: 在3级时，你可以花10分钟在你的一个没有体外运动特质的王族身上安装一个（%0%）。此外，你的鲛人不会因为安装或移除移植物而失去命中率或命中率，而且在安装新的移植物之后，他们不需要花时间来恢复。

subclassFeature.name: Charnel Voltage
entries: 3级时，你可以用电弧补充你的死灵能量。你可以选择用你的化身之触造成雷电伤害。当你花费5点或更多点数进行 "查尔纳之触 "攻击并造成闪电伤害时，你可以使能量以弧线的方式射向目标5英尺内的第二个生物。该生物必须对你的法术救赎DC做一个灵巧的救赎动作，如果失败，将受到相当于所消耗的查尔纳之触点数的一半的雷电伤害。

subclassFeature.name: Lazarus Bolt
entries: 从第6级开始，作为一个动作，你可以向你周围5英尺内的一个在过去一分钟内死亡的生物的躯干发射一个闪电，将其震醒。该生物复活时有1个命中点。该功能不能使缺乏心脏的生物、因年老而死亡的生物或缺少重要器官的生物恢复生命。一旦这个生物恢复了生命，你就可以使用你的Charnel Touch能力恢复它的命中率，持续1分钟，就像这个生物是你的一个王室成员一样。
一旦你使用这个能力，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个短期或长期休息。

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Stitching
entries: 从10级开始，你学会了如何用可怕的奥术针法在你的王族身上刻下魔法效果。你可以从你的 "地狱之触 "池中消耗10点，在你的一个王族身上施加一个奥术缝线，这个过程需要用针和线工作1分钟。奥术缝合持续到你的王族使用它，你的王族被杀死，或者你再次使用这个功能。你可以使用以下任何一种奥术针法。

entries.name: Augmented Incision
entries: 在它的回合结束之前，王族在攻击卷和能力检查上获得优势（不需要行动）。

entries.name: Bulwark Backstitch
entries: 当攻击会击中它的时候，王族会施放（%0%）。

entries.name: Fleet Threads
entries: 王子的移动速度增加三倍，直到其回合结束（不需要行动）。

entries.name: Searing Suture
entries: 一旦命中，王族会造成额外的{@dice 3d6}坏死或闪电伤害（你选择）。

subclassFeature.name: Lichdom: Patchwork Golem
entries: 在20级时，你已经达到了死灵法术的顶峰，并将自己变成了一个巫师。通过可恶的炼金术和外科手术，你为自己建造了一个人造身体，作为你灵魂的容器。

entries.name: Golem Form
entries: 你的力量、灵巧和体质分数会变成20，如果它们还没有变高的话，而且你对非魔法武器造成的非金刚砂的击打、穿刺和砍击伤害有抵抗力。此外，你不会因为安装或移除而失去命中率或命中点数（%0%），而且在安装新的嫁接物之后，你不需要花时间来恢复。

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 你对法术和其他魔法效果的救赎有优势。

subclassFeature.name: Reaper
entries: 死亡的遗忘是所有死灵法术的可靠源泉，是所有死灵法师凝视的黑暗深渊，而它有时也会回瞪。那些用自己的灵魂做赌注的罕见的死灵法师可能会与死亡交织在一起，成为收割者，成为召唤他人来世的阴影和死亡的人物。因为做了这件事，他们加强了与遥远的遗忘的联系，直到他们成为十恶不赦的影子，成为不可避免的结局的预言者。

subclassFeature.name: Shroud of Death
entries: 从你在3级时选择这个野心开始，你在身上显现出一件飘渺的黑暗斗篷，你可以将其隐藏或揭开作为一个额外动作。在披上斗篷时，你可以悬浮在离地一英寸的地方，并且无视非魔法的困难地形。此外，你可以在流体表面行走，比如水和流沙。

subclassFeature.name: Charnel Veil
entries: 三级时，你可以像死亡的幽灵一样淡出人们的视野。每当你在进行查尔纳之触的攻击时，消耗5点或更多的点数，你可以变成（%0%），直到你下一个回合开始。在这段时间内，你在移动时不会发出任何声音。

subclassFeature.name: Umbral Form
entries: 从6级开始，作为一个动作，你可以沉入一个表面，变平直到只剩下一个影子。作为一个影子，你只能沿着你所附着的表面移动，但你会获得一个与你的移动速度相等的攀爬速度。
此外，当你以影子的形式出现时，你可以在困难的表面上移动，包括天花板，而不需要进行能力检查。你不能说话或操纵物体，你所携带或持有的任何物体都不能被丢弃、使用或以其他方式进行互动。你不能攻击或施放法术。
当你处于影子的形态时，机会攻击对你不利。
如果你在黑暗中作为一个影子，对于没有黑暗视觉或在黑暗中看到的能力的生物来说，你实际上是看不见的。
你可以在你的回合中作为一个额外动作结束这个能力。

subclassFeature.name: Wraith Flight
entries: 从10级开始，你指挥的精灵会以超凡脱俗的速度移动。你的精灵的飞行速度会增加一倍。此外，当你的王族飞出敌人的攻击范围时，对它的机会攻击将处于劣势。

subclassFeature.name: Lichdom: Harbinger
entries: 在20级的时候，你已经达到了死灵法术的巅峰，并将自己变成了一个巫师。你已经成为死亡本身的化身，一个最终结局的预兆。在阴影中，你似乎只是一个穿着不祥长袍的狰狞的骷髅，一个所有人都害怕看到的景象。

entries.name: Death's Touch
entries: 当你对你能看到的生物使用 "地狱之触"，并在法术攻击卷上掷出11或更高的分数时，你会击中目标，而不考虑它的攻击力。

entries.name: Fell Flight
entries: 你获得50英尺的飞行速度。

entries.name: Grim Harvest
entries: 当你使用 "查尔纳之触 "杀死一个人形生物时，你会将他们的灵魂从他们的身体中剥离出来，在你的控制下，他们会变成一个{@creature visage|VSS}。

subclassFeature.name: Bloodwrath Guardian
entries: 你挥舞的原始力量与野外生物形成了内在的联系，你承担起了保卫它们的任务。因为你分享了野兽的凶猛、顽强和动物本能，你可以从自己体内召唤出野兽的原始力量，在兽性的恍惚中杀死你的敌人。
当你被迷惑时，你能感觉到与一个更伟大的存在的联系，即原始兽，第一个捕食者，所有猎人都是它的后代。随着你对保卫荒野免遭腐败的承诺的增长，你越来越接近原始兽，直到你最终可以自己采用它的古老形式，并允许它再次狩猎。

subclassFeature.name: Feral Trance
entries: 从你在3级时听到这个召唤开始，你可以作为一个额外动作进入一个原始的战斗恍惚状态。在恍惚状态下，你会获得以下好处。

items: 你在力量检查和力量投掷方面具有优势。
你的基本移动速度增加10英尺。
你对你标记的生物使用力量的所有近战武器攻击卷有优势。
对你的攻击有优势。

entries: 你的精神恍惚会持续1分钟。如果你被击倒失去意识，或者你的回合结束后没有攻击敌对生物或受到伤害，那么它就会提前结束。你也可以在你的回合中作为一个额外动作结束你的恍惚。
一旦你使用这个能力，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个短期或长期休息。

subclassFeature.name: Predator's Scent
entries: 到6级时，你可以像动物一样捕猎。一个被你标记的生物可以在24小时内保持标记，即使它移动到你的视线之外。此外，当这个生物被标记时，你可以毫不费力地追踪它；当它保持在同一平面存在时，你知道它的方向和距离。

subclassFeature.name: Evasion
entries: 从13级开始，你可以灵活地躲避某些区域效应，例如红龙的火热气息或{@spell ice storm}法术。当你受到一个允许你做一个灵巧救赎来承受一半伤害的效果时，如果你救赎成功，你就不会受到伤害，如果你失败，就只会受到一半伤害。

subclassFeature.name: Form of the Primal Beast
entries: 在20级时，作为一个动作，你可以变成一个由毛发和阴影组成的驼背东西，是原始兽的回声。在1分钟内，你会获得以下特征。

items: 你获得野性恍惚的所有益处。
你获得相当于你等级两倍的临时HP。
当你用近战武器攻击击中一个生物时，你可以给目标一个流血的伤口。构造物、渗虫和亡灵不能得到流血的伤口。一个生物在每个回合开始时都会因为每个流血的伤口而失去{@dice 1d8}的命中率，除非它使用一个动作来阻止流血。当一个目标在流血时，它不能恢复失去的命中率。一个生物可以有一定数量的出血伤口，其数量相当于你的熟练度加成。

entries: 一旦你使用这个功能，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成长时间的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Grey Watchman
entries: 你是人类领域的守望者，被要求在守卫或城墙上保持警惕，并不断履行职责。作为一名灰色守望者，经过战斗艺术的训练，你已经将自己的技能磨练到了剃刀的边缘，以击退任何可能挑战你的土地的入侵者。你不需要一生都守卫着同一座城堡，但是，无论你走到哪里，你都致力于保护你的土地不受入侵的军队、掠夺的怪物和其他外部威胁的影响。

subclassFeature.name: Battle Tactics
entries: 当你在3级时听到这个召唤，你就会学习由特殊骰子推动的演习，这些骰子称为战斗骰子。

entries.name: Battle Dice
entries: 你有两个战斗骰子，都是D8。当你使用一个战斗骰子时，它就会被消耗掉。当你短期或长期休息时，或当你掷出主动权时，你会重新获得你所有的战斗骰子。
你的战斗骰子会发生变化，当你在这个等级中达到一定级别时，会有更多的战斗骰子可用，如下表所示。

entries.name: Using Battle Dice
entries: 每回合一次，你可以消耗一个战役模子来执行一个你选择的机动。你的演习选项详见（%0%）。

entries.name: Saving Throws
entries: 你的某些演习需要你的目标做出一个蓄力动作来抵抗演习的效果。蓄力动作的计算方式如下。

subclassFeature.name: Hold the Line
entries: 3级时，当你使用典狱长之握时，你选择的任何在效果区域内的生物，除了你自己之外，都会获得一个+1的护甲等级和蓄力的奖励，直到你下一个回合开始时，它仍然在效果区域内。

subclassFeature.name: Fortification Expert
entries: 到了6级，你管理城墙和封锁线的经验使你对如何提高和加强城墙有了深刻的认识。你在搭建防御工事、检查城墙和其他防御设施的薄弱点和入口，或攀爬已建好的城墙时，在任何能力检查上都有优势。此外，你可以把四分之三的掩护当作完全掩护。

subclassFeature.name: Mettle
entries: 同样在13级，你的决心使你能够摆脱那些本来会伤害你的效果。当你受到一个允许你进行宪法救赎来承受一半伤害的效果时，如果你救赎成功，你就不会受到伤害，如果你失败，就只会受到一半伤害。

subclassFeature.name: Unbreakable Sentinel
entries: 从20级开始，你可以用你的行动变成一个战斗的典范，一个不可阻挡的哨兵，引导每一个男人、女人和孩子的力量在你的冲锋之下。在接下来的一分钟里，你会获得以下好处。

items: 你有一个+2的盔甲等级奖励。
每当你击中一个被你标记的生物，你就会重新获得一个已消耗的战死物。
在每一轮战斗中，你可以采取一个额外的反应。你在每个回合中只能做出一个反应。

entries: 一旦你使用这个能力，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个长时间的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Nightgaunt
entries: 饮血者、亡灵和其他夜行生物常常被人惧怕和猎杀，很少有人站出来为他们辩护；当然，除了狰狞而可怕的夜行者。夜行者的故事在童话故事中被悄悄提及，它们被认为是令人敬畏的东西：牧师的猎手和优秀的吸血鬼杀手。它们的出现总是预示着漫长的夜晚和饥饿的亡灵的大量涌现。
你感觉到月亮的召唤把你带到了活尸的墓前。尽管吸血鬼、僵尸和骷髅都很强大，但他们总是寡不敌众，被神职人员猎杀和转化；从来没有得到一个公平的机会来和平地生活。他们需要一个活人中的盟友来继续他们无休止的生活，而你已经在月光下站起来执行这个任务。

subclassFeature.name: Darkvision
entries: 从你3级听到这个召唤开始，你可以在60英尺范围内看到昏暗的光线，就像亮光一样，而在黑暗中则像昏暗的光线一样。你在黑暗中不能辨别颜色，只能辨别灰色的深浅。如果你已经拥有黑暗视觉，其范围会增加30英尺。
从13级开始，你可以看穿魔法以及非魔法的黑暗。

subclassFeature.name: Marked for Death
entries: 在3级时，你的标记会在你的目标上留下一个不死的阴影，召唤它去死。如果你用近战武器攻击对你标记的生物造成伤害，而它的剩余命中率低于你用该攻击对它造成的伤害，被标记的生物反而会下降到0命中率。

subclassFeature.name: Undead Empathy
entries: 到6级时，你甚至是无意识的亡灵的朋友。每当一个亡灵试图攻击你时，它必须做一个智慧救赎动作（DC等于8+你的熟练度加成+你的体质修饰）。 如果救赎失败，它的攻击就会失败，如果它的智力是4或更低，它就会对你和你的盟友友好。

subclassFeature.name: Evasion
entries: 从13级开始，你可以灵活地躲避某些区域效果，例如红龙的火热气息或（%0%）。当你受到一个允许你做一个灵巧救赎来承受一半伤害的效果时，如果你救赎成功，你就不会受到伤害，如果你失败，就只会受到一半伤害。

subclassFeature.name: Gravelord
entries: 在20级时，你可以用你的行动来邀请真正的亡灵能量进入你的身体，在接下来的一分钟内使自己脱离生命，并获得以下好处。

items: 你对毒药伤害和被{@condition poisoned}免疫。
你最多可以使用三次你的不灭功能，即使你今天已经使用过了。
每回合一次，当你用近战武器攻击造成伤害时，你可以造成额外的{@dice 4d6}坏死伤害，并获得临时命中率，持续到你下一回合开始，相当于造成的坏死伤害。

entries: 一旦你使用这个功能，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成长时间的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Soulblood Shaman
entries: 祖先的灵魂通过星光召唤你，让你在这个世界上颁布他们的意志，保护他们的后代，并保护他们的安息之地。你是一个灵魂之血萨满，一个灵魂的操纵者和原始魔法的苦行者。你的族群将你视为领袖以及与来世的重要联系，因为如果你发挥你的作用，他们也将与他们的祖先一起进入伟大的世界。

subclassFeature.name: Spellcasting
entries: 从你在3级时听到这个召唤开始，你可以将你古老的洞察力转化为魔法。

entries.name: Cantrips
entries: 你从{@spell druid spell list|spells|class=Druid}中学习两个你选择的咒语。你在10级时可以额外学习一个你选择的德鲁伊咒语。

entries.name: Spell Slots
entries: 灵魂血脉萨满的施法表显示了你有多少个法术槽来施展你的1级及以上德鲁伊法术。要施展其中一个法术，你必须消耗一个该法术等级或更高的法术槽。当你完成一次长时间的休息时，你会重新获得所有消耗的法术槽。

entries.name: Spells Known of 1st-Level and Higher
entries: 你会三个你选择的一级德鲁伊法术，其中两个你必须从（%0%）上的唤起或转化法术中选择。
灵魂血脉萨满法术表的 "已知法术 "一栏显示你何时学会更多1级或以上的德鲁伊法术。这些法术中的每一个都必须是你选择的唤起或转化法术，并且必须达到你有法术槽的等级。
你在8级、14级和20级学到的法术可以来自任何魔法流派。
每当你在这个等级中获得一个等级，你可以用你所选择的另一个德鲁伊法术来代替你所知道的一个德鲁伊法术（%0%）。新的法术必须是你有法术槽的等级，而且必须是唤醒或转化法术，除非你替换的是你在3、8、14或20级时从任何魔法流派获得的法术。

entries.name: Spellcasting Ability
entries: 智慧是你的德鲁伊法术的施法能力，因为你通过与伟大的超越的联系来引导你的魔法。每当法术提到你的法术能力时，你就会使用你的智慧。此外，在设定你所施展的德鲁伊法术的蓄力DC时，以及在使用德鲁伊法术进行攻击时，你都会使用你的智慧修饰。

subclassFeature.name: Soulblood
entries: 同样在第三级，当你身边5英尺内的生物对你造成伤害时，作为反应，你可以标记该生物。

subclassFeature.name: Whispers of Beyond
entries: 在6级时，当你需要指导时，你可以听到古代神灵的微小声音。如果你在进行智力或智慧检定时花了一分钟的时间进行沉思，你可以向神灵咨询以获得检定上的优势。然而，如果神灵不具备适当的知识指导，GM可以拒绝给你这个检查的优势。

subclassFeature.name: Spell Resistance
entries: 从13级开始，你在对法术的救赎上有优势。

subclassFeature.name: Ethereal Watcher
entries: 在20级时，作为一个动作，你可以在短时间内摆脱你的凡人形态，变成精神和物质的东西，一个空灵的观察者。在接下来的一分钟内，你会获得以下好处。

items: 作为你回合中的额外行动，你可以变成空灵，就像{@spell etherealness}法术一样。
你可以在施展法术时，或在你使用典狱长的标记或典狱长的抓握功能时，作为一个额外的动作从空灵状态返回。当你从空灵状态返回时，你选择的10英尺范围内的每个生物都会受到{@dice 4d10}力的伤害，因为他们会被部分地拉到两个星球之间。
你可以在不消耗法术槽的情况下施放你所知道的一阶和二阶德鲁伊法术。

entries: 一旦你使用这个能力，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个长时间的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Stoneheart Defender
entries: 你听到了来自大山的坚定不移的呼唤，矮人和侏儒世代都能感受到这种呼唤。石头在呼唤你，呼唤你成为保护者，保护大山免遭来自内部和外部的掠夺。你可能是矮人古老城墙的守望者，也可能是哨兵，在高高的山峰上巡逻瞭望；无论你站在哪里，你都是不可动摇的：一座人形的山。你从脚下的土地中汲取力量，可以用石头的力量压垮你的敌人。

subclassFeature.name: Roots of Rock
entries: 从你3级时听到这个召唤开始，当你使用你的典狱长之握能力时，岩石的根须从你的脚下萌发，将你牢牢固定。直到你下一回合开始，你的护甲等级有+2的加成。
此外，在你移动之前，你不能被敌对的行动、法术或效果从你所站的地方推开或推倒，除非你选择这样做。你在面对被击倒时的力量救赎上有优势，不能滑倒或从窗台跌落，并且对法术（%0%）、（%1%）和（%2%）免疫。

subclassFeature.name: Earthshatter
entries: 从6级开始，你可以选择将 "典狱长之握 "作为一个动作，而不是一个额外动作。当你这样做时，每个受影响的生物都必须做一个力量救赎动作（DC等于8+你的熟练度加成+你的力量修饰）或被击倒（%0%）。
你可以使用这个能力的次数与你的力量修饰值相等，并且在你完成长期休息时恢复所有使用。

subclassFeature.name: Mettle
entries: 在13级的时候，你的决心使你能够摆脱那些本来会伤害你的效果。当你受到一个允许你进行宪法救赎来承受一半伤害的效果时，如果你救赎成功，你就不会受到伤害，如果你失败，就只会受到一半伤害。

subclassFeature.name: Immortal Mountain
entries: 到20级时，你可以将真土的力量作为一项行动召唤出来，用石头的包裹保护自己。在接下来的一分钟内，你会获得以下好处。

items: 你受到的击打、穿刺和砍击伤害减少5。
你在整个持续时间内获得你的岩石之根能力的效果。
当你移动时，你可以选择将你脚下的大地颠覆，在你移动的地方留下一条5英尺宽的困难地形的痕迹。

entries: 一旦你使用这个功能，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成长时间的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Storm Sentinel
entries: 你的力量来自于愤怒的风暴云和闪电。作为一名风暴哨兵，你被要求保护迷途的水手和沿海村庄免受暴风雨的愤怒和威胁他们的巨浪的到来。你鄙视海盗和其他沿海人民的敌人，并将反对他们在任何地方袭击。
从你的指尖，你可以发出闪电的敬畏和雷霆的咆哮来摧毁你的敌人。通过练习和耐心，你可以利用风暴本身的力量，从高空飞翔并降下雷电。

subclassFeature.name: Flash from Above
entries: 从你3级听到这个召唤开始，只要你站在空旷的天空下，你就可以用你的行动变出一道无害但令人印象深刻的闪电或雷鸣。即使在你头上没有云的时候，你也可以使用这个能力。

subclassFeature.name: Thunderblast
entries: 三级时，每当你用近战武器攻击击中你标记的生物时，你选择的目标5英尺内的每个生物都会受到（%0%）的闪电伤害。

subclassFeature.name: Static Burst
entries: 从6级开始，当你使用典狱长之握作为额外行动时，每个受影响的生物在你下一回合开始前都不能做出反应。

subclassFeature.name: Evasion
entries: 从13级开始，你可以灵活地躲避某些区域效应，例如红龙的火热气息或冰风暴的咒语。当你受到一个允许你做一个灵巧救赎来承受一半伤害的效果时，如果你救赎成功，你就不会受到伤害，如果你失败，就只会受到一半伤害。

subclassFeature.name: Stormlord
entries: 从20级开始，你的飞行速度等同于你的移动速度。
此外，你可以用你的行动召唤一道闪电来攻击你，使你的身体充满了风暴的愤怒。在1分钟内，你会获得以下好处。

items: 你的飞行速度增加了一倍。
你可以在不使用法术槽的情况下，以额外动作（DC等于8+你的熟练度加成+你的体质修饰）来施放该法术（%0%）。你可以在随后的回合中以额外行动召唤闪电。

entries: 一旦你使用这个功能，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成长时间的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Verdant Protector
entries: 你从森林中的树木和你脚下的黄土中汲取力量。作为绿化保护者，你是自然界中绿色事物的捍卫者，并保护它们免受那些掠夺荒野的人的伤害。你很容易在德鲁伊和其他了解森林圣树和古老精神的人中找到盟友。
在你的命令下，地球上的植物都会发芽，协助你履行职责。在你力量的顶峰，你可以变成接骨木守护者的形态，它看起来很像树人，有坚韧的树皮和长长的树枝状手臂。

subclassFeature.name: Green Mark
entries: 从你3级时听到这个呼唤开始，当你标记一个生物时，大地的植物就会活跃起来，阻碍它前进。当这个生物在你30英尺范围内时，它所行走的地面是困难地形。

subclassFeature.name: Verdant Skin
entries: 在6级时，如果你之前没有这个技能，你会获得对（%0%）技能的熟练度。此外，你可以用你的行动画出一团厚厚的藤蔓和树叶来掩盖你。在你移动之前，你对隐藏在植被中的灵巧（隐身）检查具有优势。

subclassFeature.name: Mettle
entries: 在13级的时候，你的决心使你能够摆脱那些本来会伤害你的效果。当你受到一个允许你进行宪法救赎来承受一半伤害的效果时，如果你救赎成功，你就不会受到伤害，如果你失败，就只会受到一半伤害。

subclassFeature.name: Form of the Oak Sentinel
entries: 从20级开始，你可以使用你的行动变身为橡树哨兵，一个被树皮覆盖的森林泰坦。在1分钟内，你会获得以下特征。

items: 你的AC变成20，如果它更低的话。
你的攻击已经达到了，如果他们以前没有的话。
你可以将 "典狱长之握 "作为一个行动，而不是一个额外行动。当你这样做时，你可以对每个受影响的生物进行一次攻击，对每个目标进行单独的攻击卷。

entries: 一旦你使用这个功能，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成长时间的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Dragon Banner
entries: 龙的旗帜下的队长是战场上最可怕的战士之一。这些队长拥有一系列致命的战术，可以轻松地击溃较弱的战斗人员，如果需要的话，他们可以独自扭转战局。龙旗的面容激发了人们的恐惧和忠诚，因为龙战士留下的大屠杀和流血事件充分说明了他们的技能。

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Battle Dice
entries: 从你在3级选择此旗帜时开始，你的战斗骰子总数增加1。

subclassFeature.name: Maneuver: Cleave
entries: 同样在3级时，你学会了以下机动性。
在你的每个回合中，当你将一个敌对的生物降低到0点命中率或用近战武器攻击取得关键命中时，你可以花费一个战斗模子来移动到15英尺，并作为同一行动的一部分进行另一次近战武器攻击。一旦命中，你就会将该战役模子加入到攻击的伤害卷中。

subclassFeature.name: Maneuver: Wade Into Battle
entries: 在第7级时，你学会了以下演习。
你可以在你的回合中消耗一个战役模子来采取冲刺或脱离行动作为奖励行动。

subclassFeature.name: Maneuver: Fury Attack
entries: 在13级的时候，你学会了以下演习。
当你在你的回合中采取攻击行动时，你可以消耗一个战役骰子作为奖励行动来发动一连串的攻击。作为攻击动作的一部分，最多可以进行三次近战武器攻击，而不是一次。每次攻击必须针对不同的生物。

subclassFeature.name: Vicious Focus
entries: 从第17级开始，每当你将一个敌对的生物减少到0命中率或用近战武器攻击取得关键命中时，你就会进入一种禅定的战斗状态，持续1分钟。在这段时间内，你的武器攻击在掷出19或20的情况下可以获得关键命中。在持续时间内，每当你将另一个敌对生物的命中率降至0或取得另一个关键命中时，这个关键命中范围就会增加，首先允许你的近战武器攻击在掷出18-20时取得关键命中，然后在掷出17-20时取得，然后在掷出16-20时取得。如果你昏迷了，这个效果会提前结束。

subclassFeature.name: Eagle Banner
entries: 拥有敏锐的眼睛和更敏锐的箭，雄鹰队长寻求成为速度和远程战斗的主宰，掌握弓箭、吊索和弹弓。这样的队长在近距离内和在地平线上一样危险，因为他们可以在近距离内准确地射出一箭或弩箭。

subclassFeature.name: Maneuver: Eagle Shot
entries: 从你在3级时选择此旗帜开始，你学会了以下机动性。
当你对一个生物进行远程武器攻击卷时，你可以使用你的额外行动并消耗一个战役模子来将其加入到卷中。你可以在做出攻击卷之前或之后使用这个能力，但在GM说攻击是命中还是未中之前。

subclassFeature.name: Vantage Point
entries: 到了第7级，你可以迅速地攀爬墙壁，在你的敌人之上获得一个栖息地。你的攀爬速度等同于你的步行速度。此外，通过半速攀爬，你可以爬上困难的表面（如湿滑的垂直墙壁）而不需要进行能力检查。

subclassFeature.name: Close-Quarters Shooting
entries: 从13级开始，在敌对生物的5英尺范围内，不会对你的远程攻击卷或你15英尺范围内的友好生物的远程攻击卷造成不利。

subclassFeature.name: Scatter Shot
entries: 从17级开始，你可以用你的行动来发射一排弹丸。对15英尺范围内你选择的任何数量的生物进行一次远程武器攻击，对每个目标进行单独的攻击卷。如果你只针对这个范围内的一个生物，你的攻击在击中后会造成一个额外的武器伤害模子。

subclassFeature.name: Jolly Roger Banner
entries: 骷髅头和十字骨装饰的 "欢乐罗杰 "旗帜无需介绍：它意味着盗贼、强盗、财宝和公海上的冒险。此外，它还意味着船员们齐心协力的坚强背影，在凶猛的船长和大副的指挥下，从地平线到地平线驾驶着一艘船。

subclassFeature.name: Maneuver: Double Thrust
entries: 从你在3级时选择此旗帜开始，你学会了以下机动性。
当你在你的回合中用精巧武器进行攻击时，你可以花费一个战役模子作为奖励动作，用该武器进行一次额外的攻击。这次攻击会在武器的伤害卷中加入战役模子，而不是你的能力修改值。

subclassFeature.name: Tricky Footwork
entries: 到了第七级，你优雅的剑术可以让你把敌人放在你想要的地方。每当你在你的回合中用近战攻击击中一个与你体型相同或更小的生物时，你可以与目标交换位置。这种移动不会引起机会攻击。

subclassFeature.name: Unfair Play
entries: 从13级开始，你和你的同伴都可以使用一个额外的动作来进行隐藏或使用一个物体的动作，或者试图推开一个生物。你在力量（竞技）检查中具有优势，可以将另一个生物从船上或其他水运船只中推出。

subclassFeature.name: All Hands on Deck
entries: 到17级时，你的队员们会在你的指挥下完美地协同工作。你可以在你的回合中使用你的行动，指示你周围60英尺内能看到或听到你的每个友好生物采取你选择的行动；这个行动不能是攻击、施法、躲避或使用魔法物品的行动。一个生物可以立即使用它的反应来采取这个行动。

subclassFeature.name: Lion Banner
entries: 面对压倒性的困难时的勇敢，对骑术的精通，以及坚定不移的荣誉是狮子队长的标志。这面旗帜代表了骑士和圣骑士们渴望实现的英勇和坚韧的理想。仅仅是看到它就能激发部队的英雄主义，一个悬挂它的队长甚至能把装备最差的民兵变成一支合适的战斗部队。

subclassFeature.name: Maneuver: Lion's Challenge
entries: 从你在3级时选择此旗帜开始，你学会了以下机动性。
当你在你的回合中用武器攻击击中一个生物时，你可以消耗一个战役模子作为奖励动作，向目标挑战决斗。直到你的下一个回合结束，该目标在任何不针对你的攻击卷中都有劣势。

subclassFeature.name: Saddle Sure
entries: 从第七级开始，你在为避免从你的坐骑上摔下来而进行的拯救动作上有优势，如果你从你的坐骑上摔下来，除非你失去能力，否则你总是能以你的脚着地。此外，骑上或放下一个生物只需要花费你5英尺的移动距离，而不是你速度的一半。
最后，你可以强迫以你的坐骑为目标的攻击转而针对你。

subclassFeature.name: Reposition
entries: 从13级开始，你和你所选择的最多三个你能看到的友好生物在你掷出主动权时可以各自移动到20英尺。如果一个生物的速度为0，它就不能从这个特性中受益。

subclassFeature.name: Lion's Gambit
entries: 从17级开始，当你受到一个在你5英尺范围内的生物的伤害时，你可以用你的反应对该生物进行一次近战武器攻击，如果你击中，你可以在伤害卷上加上你一半的等级。
你可以进行三次这样的攻击，当你完成短期或长期休息时，你会恢复所有已消耗的攻击。

subclassFeature.name: Ram Banner
entries: 挥舞着公羊旗帜的队长们试图以压倒性的力量击溃他们的障碍。只要有可能，这些队长就会把他们的敌人放在后面，把他们的敌人扔到地上，或者把他们推到不利的地方，从这个位置上，他们的同伙可以迅速地解决任何抵抗。公羊旗认为这种战术不仅是公平的，而且是最佳的，因为在战斗中的有效性应该只由有效性来评判。

subclassFeature.name: Maneuver: Bull Rush
entries: 从你在3级时选择此旗帜开始，你学会了以下机动性。
当你在一条直线上移动至少10英尺，并立即对一个生物进行近战武器攻击时，你可以在攻击后使用一个额外的动作并消耗一个战役模子来推搡目标。在你为推搡目标而进行的力量（竞技）检定中加入该战役模子。如果成功，你可以选择将目标打倒在地或将其推到离你10英尺以外。

subclassFeature.name: Surefooted
entries: 从第7级开始，在非魔法的困难地形上移动时，不会花费你额外的行动力。

subclassFeature.name: Lock Horns
entries: 在13级时，你可以把你的敌人推到危险的地方。每当你把一个生物推到你的一个盟友身上时，那个盟友可以用它的反应来对被推的生物进行攻击。

subclassFeature.name: And Stay Down
entries: 从17级开始，每当一个生物在你的范围内从（%0%）站起来时，你可以对它进行一次机会攻击。

subclassFeature.name: Raven Banner
entries: 乌鸦旗象征着一个秘密的队长，他喜欢隐蔽而不喜欢行动，喜欢埋伏而不喜欢公开战斗。如果被逼急了，乌鸦队长可能会被卷入一场直接的对抗，但我们永远不能指望他们会公平竞争。这些队长可能与流氓有更多的共同点，甚至可能在盗贼行会中担任领导职务。不止一个公会会长和盗贼头目在突袭时打着乌鸦旗帜。

subclassFeature.name: Maneuver: Flanking Strike
entries: 从你在3级选择这面旗帜开始，你就接受了伏击战术的训练。你学会了以下演习。
如果你用武器攻击击中一个生物，而你的一个盟友在目标的5英尺范围内，你可以消耗一个战斗模子来瞄准该生物最重要的地方。在攻击的伤害卷上加上该战役模子和你的一半等级（向下取整）。这种攻击必须使用精巧的武器或轻型武器。

subclassFeature.name: Maneuver: Effortless Dodge
entries: 同样在3级时，你学会了以下机动性。
作为一个额外的动作，你可以花费一个战役模子来进行躲避动作。你在穿着中型或重型盔甲时不能使用这个动作。

subclassFeature.name: Covert
entries: 在第7级时，当你隐藏起来并被一个生物通过智慧（感知）检查发现时，你可以重新尝试用灵巧（隐形）检查来隐藏。一旦成功，你就会悄悄地重新定位自己，而该生物也不会注意到你。一旦你使用这个能力，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个短期或长期休息。

subclassFeature.name: Strike First, Strike Last
entries: 从13级开始，你可以在敌人攻击的前一刻进行干预。当你能看到的敌对生物发动攻击时，作为一种反应，你可以在不引起机会攻击的情况下以你的速度向该生物移动，并以它为目标进行一次攻击。在该生物进行任何攻击之前解决你的攻击。
一旦你使用这个能力，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个长时间的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Guerilla Warfare
entries: 从17级开始，你是一个非常规战斗的大师。你在对任何尚未在战斗中采取回合的生物进行攻击时具有优势。此外，在第一轮战斗中，你第一次用攻击击中一个生物时，你可以在攻击的伤害卷上增加两个战斗骰子，而无需消耗它们。

subclassFeature.name: Turtle Banner
entries: 打着海龟旗号的船长们的坚固防线是传奇性的。海龟战术强调耐力和生存，因为受到良好保护的士兵不仅能赢得战斗，还能赢得整个战争。长远考虑是任何防御战略的关键，因为海龟的队长们知道答案永远不是他们应该如何反击，而是何时反击。

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Proficiencies
entries: 当你在3级选择此旗帜时，你获得对重甲的熟练度。

subclassFeature.name: Maneuver: Iron Shell
entries: 同样在3级时，你学会了以下机动性。
作为一个额外的行动，你可以花费一个战役模子来强化一个你能看到的60英尺范围内的盟友。该盟友在下一分钟内对其进行下一次攻击时，其护甲等级将获得相当于战役骰子上所掷数字一半的奖励，向下取整（最小为+1）。

subclassFeature.name: Slow and Steady
entries: 从第七级开始，你的速度不能被移除，你不能被击倒（%0%）或违背你的意志而移动。

subclassFeature.name: Shield Wall
entries: 到13级时，你可以在你的盔甲后面庇护他人。对于通过你的空间的效果，你算作在你5英尺范围内与你体型相同和更小的同盟生物的一半掩护。

subclassFeature.name: Unbreakable
entries: 从17级开始，你可以甩掉原本会击中你的攻击。你有一个20点的护甲值。当你被近战武器攻击击中时，作为一种反应，你可以消耗任意数量的护甲点，并将它们加到你对该攻击的护甲等级上，有可能导致该攻击失败。当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会恢复所有消耗的护甲点。

subclassFeature.name: Armorist
entries: 对影响心灵的炼金术的研究是一个微妙的问题，只有少数炼金术士，即所谓的爱欲者，才会进行这种研究。他们通常被客户称为 "爱情医生"，专门酿造能使饮用者产生强烈情感反应的药水。虽然到目前为止，爱情药水是他们最受欢迎的产品，但爱情学家也可以制作刺激性的费洛蒙炸弹，甚至可以软化可怕怪物的心。

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Proficiencies
entries: 当你在2级时选择这个研究领域，你会获得{@skill Deception}和{@skill Persuasion}技能的熟练度。

subclassFeature.name: Pheromone Bomb
entries: 从第二级开始，你可以制作费洛蒙炸弹。通过将你的炸弹的爆炸性试剂换成有效的费洛蒙，你可以将它变成一个费洛蒙炸弹。信息素炸弹需要用智慧救赎来代替灵巧救赎。炸弹不会造成任何伤害，反而会使目标，以及爆炸半径内的每个生物，如果救赎失败，就会被你影响（%0%），直到其回合结束或受到伤害。

subclassFeature.name: Magnetic Personality
entries: 从6级开始，你可以在你做的魅力检查中加入你的智力修饰。

subclassFeature.name: Alchemical Perfume
entries: 从10级开始，你佩戴一种芳香的改变心智的香水，使他人对你产生好感。当一个在你5英尺范围内的敌对生物对你进行攻击时，它必须对你的炸弹拯救DC进行智慧拯救，否则在攻击卷中处于不利地位。一旦一个生物成功地完成了这个救赎，它就会在24小时内对这个效果免疫。免疫力为0%的生物会自动完成这一救赎。

subclassFeature.name: Alchemical Romance
entries: 从18级开始，在长时间的休息中，你可以花费4个试剂骰子来制作一种极其有效的真爱药水。这种药水的作用很像（%0%），只是当你制作药水时，你会选择目标视为其真爱的生物，前提是目标认识该生物或在饮用药水的24小时内遇到该生物。此外，这个效果会无限期地持续下去，只有当你制作一个新的真爱药水时才会结束，或者这个效果被{@spell remove curse}法术或类似的魔法移除。当这种药水的效果在目标身上结束时，它将以完全厌恶的态度看待它曾经爱过的生物，并且永远不会再爱那个生物。

subclassFeature.name: Apothecary
entries: 许多有实际想法的炼金术士承担了药剂师的角色，因为冒险队伍总是需要一个治疗师，而牧师可能是短缺的。在他们的休息时间，这样的炼金术士有一个可以依赖的市场技能来获得收入，并且可以用他们的知识做大量的好事。炼药师经常在工作中研究药水和草药学，更愿意学习如何修补身体，而不是破坏它。

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Proficiencies
entries: 当你在2级选择这个研究领域时，你获得对（%0%）技能的熟练度。

subclassFeature.name: Formula: Painkiller Bomb
entries: 二级时，你可以制造止痛剂炸弹。通过将你的炸弹的爆炸试剂与镇痛油浆混合，你可以将它变成一个镇痛炸弹。止痛弹不会造成任何伤害，而是给予其爆炸半径内的每个生物相当于（%0%）加你炼金术士等级一半的临时命中率，持续到你下一回合结束。该炸弹对构筑物和亡灵没有效果。

subclassFeature.name: Potion Toss
entries: 从6级开始，你已经开发出一种化学机制，可以更有效地将药水送到远方的盟友手中。你可以用你的行动向你周围20英尺内愿意的生物投掷药水。目标获得的好处就像他们正常喝了药水一样。

subclassFeature.name: Self-Medication
entries: 到了10级，你已经测试出了自己对止痛药的耐受性，以至于你可以定期服用一小部分而不受影响。每当你喝下具有恢复命中率效果的药水时（即使你已经有了所有的命中率），你在救赎时获得优势，直到你下一回合结束。

subclassFeature.name: Alchemical Resurrection
entries: 从18级开始，你的药力足以唤醒死人。通过使用你的行动将价值500金币的钻石粉混合到{@item potion of superior healing}或{@item potion of supreme healing}中，你可以制造一种唤醒死者的药剂。将这种药水倒在一具死亡时间不超过10天的人形尸体上作为行动，会产生（%2%）法术的效果。

subclassFeature.name: Ionzier
entries: 很少有炼金术师对爆破器或个人防护罩发射器等设备的替代方案进行研究，更多的是出于科学的好奇心，而不是真的创新精神。然而，少数人成为真正的能量操纵大师。这些所谓的电离器可以使用复杂的炼金术反应使大多数形式的能量屈服于他们的意志。
电离器研究领域使用《暗物质》一书中的爆破器规则。

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Proficiencies
entries: 当你在2级选择这个研究领域时，你获得技术技能的熟练度。

subclassFeature.name: Plasma Bomb
entries: 2级时，你可以制作等离子体炸弹。通过将炸弹的爆炸性试剂替换成离子交换器，你可以将它变成一个等离子体炸弹。等离子炸弹会造成辐射伤害，而不是火灾伤害。当你用这个炸弹击中一个生物时，一种强烈的吸引力使它永久地粘在该生物身上，在该生物的回合结束时爆炸并造成正常的伤害。

subclassFeature.name: Heatsink
entries: 到了6级，你已经学会了一种炼金术，可以把多余的热量从爆破器上引开，使其温度正常。每回合一次，你可以使用一个行动或一个额外的行动来对你接触到的爆破器进行过冷处理。在接下来的一分钟内，当这个爆破器会过热时，它会自动降温并停止过热。如果你对一个过热的爆破器进行过冷，它将立即停止过热。
你可以使用这个能力的次数等于你的智力修饰值，并且在你完成长时间休息时恢复所有消耗的使用。

subclassFeature.name: Electromagnetic Shield
entries: 从10级开始，你发现了一种通过逆向工程的等离子体炸弹来转移有害射弹的方法。当你被一个造成力量、闪电、坏死或辐射伤害的远程武器攻击击中时，作为一种反应，你可以掷出一个（%0%）。如果掷出6分，攻击就会打偏。

subclassFeature.name: Energetic Discharge
entries: 在18级时，你创造了一个拳头大小的 "放电装置"，可以吸收、储存和重新定向少量的任何击中你的能量。当你使用你的电磁盾功能时，无论你如何翻滚，你的放电装置都会获得1次充电，最多10次。充电时间持续24小时。作为你回合的额外行动，你可以消耗任何数量的存储电荷，并对60英尺内的目标进行一次远程攻击。一旦命中，目标就会因每一次消耗的电荷而受到{@dice 1d8}武力或辐射伤害（你选择）。

subclassFeature.name: Mad Bomber
entries: 虽然许多疯狂的炸弹袭击者实际上并不疯狂，但需要一种特殊的疯狂才能将自己的生命投入到研究爆炸物中。大多数专攻这一领域的炼金术士都是无可救药的发火狂，他们以燃烧、爆破和炸毁东西为乐。疯狂的炸弹人总是在努力提高他们的炸弹的有效性。

subclassFeature.name: Blasting Specialty
entries: 从你在2级选择这个研究领域开始，你的炸弹对物体和结构造成双倍伤害。

subclassFeature.name: Formula: Shrapnel Bomb
entries: 2级时，你可以制造弹片炸弹。通过用金属轴承增强你的炸弹的爆炸试剂，你可以把它变成一个弹片炸弹。弹片炸弹造成的是穿透性伤害，而不是火焰伤害，有{@dice d8}伤害骰子，并在10英尺范围内爆炸。

subclassFeature.name: Timed Demolition
entries: 在6级的时候，你已经学会了如何设置炸弹的延迟爆炸。当你采取{@action Use an Object}行动给炸弹填料并投掷它时，你可以为它的引爆设定一个持续时间，这个持续时间可以是任何数量的回合（6秒的任何增量），最多1分钟。在这个持续时间之后，炸弹会在你的回合结束时引爆。

subclassFeature.name: Blast Shield
entries: 从10级开始，你已经开发出一种元素镀层来保护你免受危险能量的伤害。你获得了对你所选择的酸、冷、火或闪电伤害的抵抗力，并且每当你完成一次长时间的休息就可以改变你的选择。

subclassFeature.name: Formula: Black Powder Bomb
entries: 从18级开始，你可以制作可怕的黑火药炸弹。通过将你的炸弹的爆炸试剂换成黑火药，你可以把它变成黑火药炸弹。黑火药炸弹有{@dice d12}的伤害骰子。

subclassFeature.name: Mutagenist
entries: 炼金术的研究从根本上说是对转化的研究。所有的炼金术士都将世俗的材料转化为神奇的物质：药水、灵药和炸弹，但有些人却更进一步。你已经发现了诱变剂的秘密，它是转化的关键，它使你能够改变你的身体，获得超自然的力量或速度，长出额外的四肢或爪子，或使你的皮肤变厚成为一个石质护罩。

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Proficiencies
entries: At 2nd level, you gain proficiency in your choice of the {@skill Acrobatics} or {@skill Athletics} skill, as well as in the use of shields.

subclassFeature.name: Mutagen
entries: Beginning at 2nd level, you can use your bonus action to inject yourself with a powerful transmutative potion known as a mutagen. You gain one of the following benefits of your choice for 1 minute, or until you use your bonus action to inject yourself with a different mutagen:

entries.name: Strength
entries: Your Strength score increases by 3, to a maximum of 20. Additionally, you sprout claws, fangs, spines, horns, or a different natural weapon of your choice. You can use this natural weapon to make unarmed strikes. On a hit, you deal damage equal to {@dice 1d4} + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike. The damage of this attack is bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing, as appropriate for the natural weapon.

entries.name: Dexterity
entries: Your Dexterity score increases by 3, to a maximum of 20. Additionally, your movement speed increases by 5 feet.

entries.name: Constitution
entries: Your Constitution score increases by 3, to a maximum of 20. When you gain this increase, your current and maximum hit points increase accordingly with your new Constitution score, but when this effect ends, both your current and maximum hit points decrease by the same amount.

subclassFeature.name: Shared Mutagen
entries: At 6th level, you've created a formulation of your mutagens generic enough to safely be injected into others. You can use your action and spend a reagent die to inject a willing creature within 5 feet of you with a mutagen of your choice. A creature can only be under the effect of one mutagen at a time. Once you have injected another creature with a mutagen, you can't do so again until the original mutagen ends.

subclassFeature.name: Advanced Mutation
entries: Starting at 10th level, whenever you inject yourself with a mutagen, you can choose one of the following additional mutations:

entries.name: Hyperelastic
entries: Your flesh takes on a rubbery quality, allowing you to bend and stretch with ease. Your melee weapon attacks gain the Reach property, if they did not already have them. Additionally, you have advantage on ability checks you make to escape {@action grapple} or slip binds.

entries.name: Mucilaginous
entries: Your skin secretes a thick, extremely sticky substance which helps you adhere to objects. You can move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving your hands free. You also have a climbing speed equal to your walking speed. Additionally, creatures have disadvantage on ability checks made {@action to escape grapple|actions|Escape a Grapple} with you.

entries.name: Polybrachia
entries: You grow a pair of additional arms. These arms are fully functional and can be used to hold weapons and shields (allowing you to hold 2 two-handed weapons, or 4 one-handed weapons), perform somatic components of spells, and perform other actions, though the arms themselves don't grant you any additional actions.

subclassFeature.name: Mutated Blood
entries: By 18th level, your mutagens have permanently altered your biology. Choose Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution. This ability score increases by 2 and its maximum becomes 22. Once you have chosen an ability score, this selection can't be altered.

subclassFeature.name: Ooze Rancher
entries: Unsurprisingly, oozes, jellies, and slimes are a fascinating subject of subject for alchemists who wish to piece together how inanimate chemicals can form together and rise up in a moving, hungry mass. The answer to this question may very well be at the heart of alchemy itself. Alchemists which choose to research slimes in depth are called ooze ranchers, for they breed and keep numerous slimes to experiment upon.

subclassFeature.name: Ooze Empathy
entries: Starting when you choose this field of study at 2nd level, you've developed a pheromone mix which engenders all kinds of slime to you. Whenever an ooze tries to attack you, it must make a Wisdom saving throw against your bomb save DC. On a failed save, its attack misses. On a successful save, the ooze is immune to this feature for the next 24 hours.

subclassFeature.name: Formula: Slime Bomb
entries: At 2nd level, you can create slime bombs. By mixing your bomb's explosive contents with the remnants of an ooze, you can change it into a slime bomb. A slime bomb deals no damage, but coats each creature within the blast radius in a viscous, green slime. No creature coated in slime can take the {@action Dash} action or the {@action Disengage} action. Slime can be removed by dousing a creature with a gallon of water or by taking an action to remove most of it.

subclassFeature.name: Bottled Oozes
entries: Starting at 6th level, you've learned a clever alchemical trick for condensing oozes into denser states and storing them in stasis for later use. Whenever you brew potions, you can spend 2 reagent dice to create an {@item Ooze Bottle|VSS}.

subclassFeature.name: Liquid Anatomy
entries: By 10th level, your experiments with ooze alchemy has resulted in injecting yourself with a measure of ozoplasm, a fundamental substance which composes oozes and slimes. As a result, you can move through any space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing (though your equipment does not similarly compress). Moreover, you take no additional damage from critical hits.

subclassFeature.name: Ooze Jug
entries: Beginning at 18th level, you've solved the major problem preventing large oozes from being bottled: you just needed a much larger bottle. You have one ooze jug, which functions like an {@item Ooze Bottle|VSS}, but contains a larger ooze. You can only have one ooze jug at a time and it can only contain one ooze at a time. You can fill it with the following oozes when you brew potions:

subclassFeature.name: Venomsmith
entries: For every alchemist that has devoted his or her life to healing the sick and infirm, there is another with a darker calling. Commonly called poisoners or venomsmiths, these alchemists are masters in the art of crafting deadly and debilitating poisons. Whether employed by an assassin's guild or performing assassinations themselves, a venomsmith's presence is usually accompanied by untimely death.

subclassFeature.name: Poisoner
entries: Beginning when you choose this field of study at 2nd level, you gain the {@optfeature Poisoner|VSS} discovery. Until you reach 3rd level, you have 2 reagent dice which can spend only on crafting poisons using this discovery. You can't later replace this discovery with a different one when you gain a level in this class.
Additionally, when you deal poison damage to a creature, you ignore resistance to poison damage and you treat immunity to poison damage as resistance instead, dealing half damage.

subclassFeature.name: Formula: Venom Bomb
entries: At 2nd level, you can create venom bombs. By mixing a few drops of a fast-acting toxin into your bomb's explosive components, you can change it into a venom bomb. A venom bomb deals poison damage instead of fire damage, has {@dice d8} damage dice, and requires a Constitution saving throw instead of a Dexterity save. Additionally, the target, as well as each creature within the blast radius that fails its saving throw, have disadvantage on the next Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution saving throw it makes before the end of its next turn.

subclassFeature.name: Alchemical Assassin
entries: Beginning at 6th level, you are adept at applying poisons without being seen. You have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Sleight of Hand}) checks you make to add ingested poison to food or drink, to apply poison to a weapon you are holding without being seen, or to place a vial of poison on another person without them noticing.

subclassFeature.name: Mithridatism
entries: By 10th level, by administering yourself small doses of various poisons and toxins, you have developed immunity to their ravages. You have immunity to poison damage and to being {@condition poisoned}.

subclassFeature.name: Toxic Recompense
entries: Starting the 18th level, whenever a creature within 5 feet of you hits you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to unleash a spray of poisonous vapor. The attacker must make a Constitution saving throw against your bomb save DC or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned, the creature takes {@dice 1d10} poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

subclassFeature.name: Dynamo Engineer
entries: As an early alchemical thesis states: if the fundamental energy of magic could be captured within physical substance, there would be no need for magic-users. Some alchemists have founded their careers on this notion, inventing and iterating upon small devices known as spell dynamos, which can store and manipulate arcane energy. These dynamos can be configured to store their energy at a specific resonance, such that, when it is released, it perfectly replicates the effect of a spell. Indeed, these few alchemists have begun to brave the frontier of spellcasting without an ounce of arcane talent; just a knack for tinkering and endless inventiveness.

subclassFeature.name: Spectrum Analyzer
entries: Starting at 2nd level, you have invented a small device shaped like a monocle capable of rendering magical auras visible to the naked eye. You can cast the {@spell detect magic} spell once without using a spell slot or spell components. Once you cast the spell in this way, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Spellcasting
entries: Also at 2nd level, you can cast spells by storing and releasing energy in spell dynamos. See the core rules for the general rules of spellcasting and the {@filter wizard spell list|spells|class=Wizard}.

entries.name: Spell Dynamos
entries: You power your spells through handheld arcane devices called spell dynamos, which each hold a single spell slot. The Dynamo Engineer Spellcasting table shows how many spell dynamos you have. The table also shows what the level of those slots held in each of your dynamos is; all of these spell slots are the same level. To cast one of your wizard spells of 1st level or higher, you must expend a spell dynamo. You regain all expended spell dynamos when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Preparing Spells
entries: Unlike other spells, you must prepare the spells held in each of your spell dynamos in advance. When you finish a long rest, you configure each of your dynamos to cast a particular wizard spell you know. You can only use a spell dynamo to cast a spell to which it is configured. When you finish a short or long rest, you can reconfigure your unexpended dynamos to hold different spells.

entries.name: Spells Known of 1st-Level and Higher
entries: You know three 1st-level wizard spells of your choice, two of which you must choose from the evocation and transmutation spells on the {@filter wizard spell list|spells|class=Wizard}.

The Spells Known column of the Dynamo Engineer Spellcasting table shows when you learn more wizard spells of 1st level or higher. Each of these spells must be an evocation or transmutation spell of your choice, and must be of a level for which you have spell slots.
你在8级、14级和20级学到的法术可以来自任何魔法流派。

Whenever you gain a level in this class, you can replace one of the wizard spells you know with another spell of your choice from the {@filter wizard spell list|spells|class=Wizard}. The new spell must be of a level for which you have spell slots, and it must be an evocation or transmutation spell, unless you're replacing the spell you gained at 3rd, 8th, 14th, or 20th level from any school of magic.

entries.name: Spellcasting Ability
entries: Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for your wizard spells, since you cast them using cutting-edge arcane technology. You use your Intelligence whenever a spell refers to your spellcasting ability. Use your bomb save DC as the saving throw DC for a wizard spell you cast, and use your Intelligence modifier when making an attack roll with one.

subclassFeature.name: Formula: Arcano Bomb
entries: Starting at 6th level, you can craft arcano bombs. By adding an unexpended dynamo to your bomb (and thus expending the dynamo's spell slot), you can change it into an arcano bomb. An arcano bomb deals force damage instead of fire damage, its damage dice are {@dice d12}s, and it deals one extra die of damage, as if a reagent die were added to it.

subclassFeature.name: Counter-Discharge
entries: Beginning at 10th level, when a creature you can see casts a spell that affects you, you can use your reaction to expend a spell dynamo to release a wave of disruptive magical energy. If the spell requires you to make a saving throw to resist its effects, you have advantage on the saving throw. If the spell deals damage, you have resistance against it. Once you use this ability, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Recycler
entries: By 18th level, you can convert otherwise wasted magical energy into a usable form. When you miss with an arcano bomb, you can recycle the spell slot stored in the dynamo and transfer it to one of the empty dynamos on your person.

subclassFeature.name: Xenoalchemist
entries: A small number of renegade alchemists elect to experiment on themselves, modifying their anatomy or even outright attaching new body parts. These experiments are often considered unethical and dangerous, even by other alchemists, and those that practice them are branded xenoalchemists for their efforts. As xenoalchemists progress in their studies, they invariably stumble upon the dangerous practice of alchemical necromancy, which allows them to imbue unlife upon amalgamations of body parts.

subclassFeature.name: Xenobiology
entries: Starting when you choose this field of study at 2nd level, you have advantage on all ability checks you make to identify or research monsters.

subclassFeature.name: Mad Scientist
entries: By 2nd level, you've learned the finer points of reanimating dead appendages and stitching them to things. You gain two {@filter monstrous grafts|optionalfeatures|feature type=Graft} of your choice. Additionally, you don't lose hit points or Hit Dice from installing or removing grafts, and it takes you no time to recover after the attachment of a new graft. See {@filter this page|optionalfeatures|feature type=Graft} for monstrous grafts.

subclassFeature.name: Surgical Attack
entries: Beginning at 6th level, whenever you take the Attack or prime and throw a bomb on your turn, you can make an unarmed strike as part of that action. You can only use this ability if your unarmed strike is improved by a graft, such as Bestial Features.

subclassFeature.name: Necromantic Organs
entries: By 10th level, you've learned how to tinge your own biology with necromancy through reanimated organs that will persist after your death. If you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead.
一旦你使用这个能力，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个长时间的休息。

subclassFeature.name: It's Alive
entries: Beginning at 18th level, your research into the field of necromancy has culminated in an alchemical golem stitched together from discarded body parts. You can create an {@creature alchemy golem|VSS} through an 8-hour long procedure, which can be conducted over the course of a long rest. To complete this process, you must have a healer's kit, alchemist's supplies, and a knife (or a facility with access to such tools), as well as at least three recently deceased humanoid corpses.

Your {@creature alchemy golem|VSS} acts independently on its own turn, but always obeys your commands. On each of your turns, you can use a bonus action to mentally command your golem if it is within 60 feet of you. You decide what action the golem will take and where it will move during its next turn, or you can issue a general command, such as to guard a particular chamber or corridor. If you issue no commands, the golem only defends itself against hostile creatures. Once given an order, the golem continues to follow it until its task is complete.
The golem can use your Intelligence modifier + your proficiency bonus for its attack rolls.
When the {@creature alchemy golem|VSS} drops to 0 hit points, it dies. You can restore your {@creature alchemy golem|VSS}'s hit points and reanimate it over the course of a short or long rest.
You can attach up to three {@filter grafts|optionalfeatures|feature type=Graft} to your {@creature alchemy golem|VSS}. You can only have one {@creature alchemy golem|VSS} at a time.

subclassFeature.name: House of Bishops
entries: The House of Bishops adopts warmages with true arcane potential, expanding on essential magic principles with true spellcasting. Such warmages might be easily confused for wizards or sorcerers, for they don the same garb and wield many of the same spells, but the warmage focus on perfection still holds precedence over garnering a vast array of spells.

subclassFeature.name: Spellcasting
entries: When you choose this house at 3rd level, you gain the ability to cast spells more potent than cantrips.

entries.name: Spell Slots
entries: The Bishop Spellcasting table shows how many spell slots you have to cast your spells of 1st level and higher. To cast one of these spells, you must expend a slot of the spell's level or higher. You regain all expended spell slots when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Spells Known of 1st-Level and Higher
entries: You know three 1st-level wizard spells of your choice, two of which you must choose from the {@filter conjuration and evocation spells on the wizard spell list|spells|class=wizard|school=C;V}.

The Spells Known column of the Bishop Spellcasting table shows when you learn more wizard spells of 1st level or higher. Each of these spells must be a conjuration or evocation spell of your choice, except for the spells learned at 8th, 14th, and 20th level, and must be of a level for which you have spell slots.

Whenever you gain a level in this class, you can replace one of the wizard spells you know with another spell of your choice from the {@filter wizard spell list|spells|class=Wizard}. The new spell must be of a level for which you have spell slots, and it must be a conjuration or evocation spell, unless you're replacing the spell you gained at 3rd, 8th or 14th level.

entries.name: Warmage Edge
entries: You can add additional damage with your warmage spells of 1st level or higher using your Warmage Edge feature, as if they were cantrips. You can't add Warmage Edge damage to the {@spell magic missile|PHB} spell.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Study
entries: At 3rd level, you gain proficiency in two of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Arcana}, {@skill History}, {@skill Investigation}, {@skill Medicine}, or {@skill Religion}.

subclassFeature.name: Mystical Companion
entries: At 7th level, you learn the {@spell find familiar|PHB} spell and can cast it as a ritual. The spell doesn't count against your number of spells known.

When you cast the spell, you can choose one of the normal forms for your familiar or one of the following special forms: {@creature imp}, {@creature pseudodragon}, {@creature quasit}, or {@creature sprite}.

subclassFeature.name: Siege Casting
entries: At 10th level, your warmage spells deal double damage to objects and structures. Additionally, when you cast a warmage spell that requires a spell attack roll, you can cast it at up to double its normal range. If its target is beyond its normal range, you have disadvantage on the attack roll.

subclassFeature.name: Spell Sculpting
entries: Starting at 15th level, when you cast a warmage spell that affects other creatures that you can see, you can choose a number of them up to your Intelligence modifier. The chosen creatures automatically succeed on their saving throws against the spell, and they take no damage if they would normally take half damage on a successful save.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Dominance
entries: At 18th level, you learn a powerful magical trick. As a bonus action on your turn, you can expend a number of spell slots with a combined level of 6 or more to regain an expended use of your Arcane Surge.

subclassFeature.name: House of Cards
entries: Warmages who join the House of Cards approach combat the same way they do games of chance, with high stakes, and calculated gambles. Each warmage of this house wields a special deck of cards tied to the very threads of fate, through which they can empower their magic with deft flurries of hands. However, while these warmages command incredible power, their magical surges are at the whims of the cards, and so they must make strategic, ingenious plays to master them.

subclassFeature.name: Bluff
entries: When you choose this house at 3rd level, your poker face carries you through practically any lie. You gain proficiency in the {@skill Deception} skill and with the {@item playing card set|PHB}, if you don't already have it. Additionally, you can use your Intelligence instead of Charisma for Charisma (Deception) checks you make.

subclassFeature.name: Deck of Fate
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you gain a deck of magical playing or tarot cards, called a Deck of Fate, through which you can enhance the power of your cantrips. Shuffle a standard 52-card playing card deck and draw a hand of five cards when you roll initiative.

Whenever you target a hostile creature with a warmage spell that deals damage, you can use your bonus action to play one or more cards from your hand to enhance the power of the spell. If the cards exactly match one of the results on the Hands table, the spell deals extra damage to one of the spell's targets of your choice or grants you one additional effect, according to the result. If the cards don't match a result, they have no effect. Aces count as ones for results. Once you play a card, place it on the bottom of your deck and until you have five cards in your hand again.

entries.caption: Hands
rows: Any five sequential cards of any suit.
Any five cards of the same suit in any order.
Any three of the same number.
Any two of the same number.
You gain temporary hit points equal to your intelligence modifier.
Your speed increases by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.
You gain a +1 bonus to your AC until the start of your next turn.
You gain a +1 bonus to saving throws until the start of your next turn.

subclassFeature.name: High Stakes
entries: At 7th level, you've mastered a very risky card trick using your Deck of Fate. On your turn, you can choose any number of cards from your hand and place them on the bottom of your deck (no action required), losing 2 hit points per card you chose. You then draw until you have five cards in your hand again.

subclassFeature.name: Dealer's Choice
entries: At 10th level, you can use your bonus action to gain one of the following effects, chosen by the GM:

items: You gain resistance to all damage until the end of your next turn.
You teleport to an unoccupied space you can see within 60 feet of you.
You vanish into a safe, endless demiplane until the start of your next turn, at which time you return at the same location from which you vanished.

subclassFeature.name: Card Reading
entries: Beginning at 15th level, once on each of your turns when you draw a card from your deck as part of your Deck of Fate feature, you can declare a suit (Clubs, Diamonds, Hearts, or Spades) and check the top card of your deck. If you guessed the suit correctly, you can take the Dash, Disengage, or Use an Object action as part of the bonus action used for the feature.

subclassFeature.name: Ace In The Hole
entries: Beginning at 18th level, you are a deckmaster. Whenever you would draw one or more cards from your deck, draw twice as many. Put half of the drawn cards on the bottom of your deck and the other cards in your hand.

subclassFeature.name: House of Dice
entries: The House of Dice throws out the warmage convention of meticulous, deliberate spellcasting in favor of wild, chaotic magic that presses the odds. Everything from their magical bursts to their enchanted sets of dice can fail horribly, so it's auspicious that they often keep their fingers on the scales of fate. These warmages have mastered not only a repertoire of cantrips, but also techniques to manipulate fortune itself, allowing them to risk everything, and more than often come out on top.

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Proficiencies
entries: Starting when you choose this house at 3rd level, your light fingers and unscrupulous tactics help you win the day. You gain proficiency in the {@skill Sleight of Hand} skill and with the {@item dice set|PHB}, if you don't already have it.

subclassFeature.name: Dice of Fate
entries: At 3rd level, you gain four Dice of Fate, which are d6s. Whenever you make an ability check, attack roll, saving throw, or damage roll, you can expend one Die of Fate and add it to the roll. Once you expend a Die of Fate, it goes to the GM, who can use it to add it to a roll made by an NPC or monster. Once the GM has used a die, it passes back to you, and so on. When you finish a long rest, you regain all of your expended Dice of Fate, whether or not the GM has used them.
Beginning at 7th level, you have an additional two Dice of Fate, and you can add two Dice of Fate to your damage rolls with warmage spells.

subclassFeature.name: Chaos Roll
entries: Also at 3rd level, you can expend two of your Dice of Fate as an action, rolling them on the table below to create a chaotic surge of energy.

rows: You cast {@spell fireball}, centered on yourself.
Your AC is reduced by 2 until the start of your next turn.
Each creature other than yourself within 60 feet of you can speak only in a babbling nonsense language for the next minute, and can't perform the verbal components of spells.
A 5-foot-radius sphere of butterflies, insects, or doves fills a location you choose within 60 feet of you, heavily obscuring the area until the start of your next turn.
You gain 7 temporary hit points, and keep the Dice of Fate instead of giving  them to the GM.
You become invisible until the end of your next turn, as per the {@spell invisibility} spell.
A random object within 60 feet of you explodes, dealing no damage to you or your allies, and dealing {@dice 3d6} fire damage to one creature caught in the blast chosen by the GM.

You teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. Each creature within 5 feet of the destination must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC or take {@dice 2d6} force damage.
Choose a creature you can see within 60 feet of you. That creature takes {@dice 4d6} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt.
You cast {@spell lightning bolt} and can add the Dice of Fate to the damage roll.

subclassFeature.name: Loaded Dice
entries: By 7th level, you can subtly cheat your dice. Once on each of your turns when you roll a d6, you can flip the die upside down. Note that on a balanced d6, the top and bottom numbers add up to 7, so you can determine the bottom number by subtracting the top number from 7.

subclassFeature.name: Twisted Fate
entries: Starting at 10th level, the winds of chance follow your die rolls, rather than vice versa. When you make an attack roll or ability check with disadvantage on your turn, you can attempt to invert fate as a bonus action. Expend a Die of Fate and roll it; on a 5, you ignore disadvantage on the roll, on a 6, you instead have advantage on the roll.

subclassFeature.name: Roll The Bones
entries: Beginning at 15th level, you can channel the chaotic energy of your dice in an instant. As a reaction when you take damage from a creature you can see, you can expend two Dice of Fate to make a Chaos Roll.

subclassFeature.name: Steal Luck
entries: Starting at 18th level, when you roll initiative, roll a d6. You steal that many Dice of Fate back from the GM.

subclassFeature.name: House of Kings
entries: Warmages who train in the House of Kings specialize in tactics and strategy, learning age-old maneuvers to give them the edge in combat. Natural-born leaders, Kings work best with a cadre of supporters to perform their tactics and overwhelm the enemy. Moreso than all other warmages, those in the House of Kings treat life and death as little more than a game of strategy to be understood and conquered.

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Proficencies
entries: When you choose this house at 3rd level, you gain proficiency with medium armor, as well as battleaxes, lances, longswords, tridents, and warhammers.

subclassFeature.name: Battle Tactics
entries: At 3rd level, you learn stratagems that are fueled by special dice called battle dice.

entries.name: Battle Dice
entries: You have two battle dice, which are d8s. A battle die is expended when you use it. You regain all of your expended battle dice when you finish a short or long rest, or when you roll initiative.
你的战斗骰子会发生变化，当你在这个等级中达到一定级别时，会有更多的战斗骰子可用，如下表所示。

entries.name: Using Battle Dice
entries: Once per turn, you can expend a battle die to perform a stratagem of your choice. Your stratagem options are detailed at the end of the subclass description.

entries.name: Saving Throws
entries: When a stratagem calls for a saving throw to resist its effects, the saving throw DC is equal to your spell save DC.

subclassFeature.name: Stratagems
entries: On your turn you can use one of the following Stratagems:

items: {@italic {@bold Blitz.}}  As a bonus action, when you hit a creature with an attack, you can expend one battle die to maneuver one of your comrades into a more advantageous position. Choose a friendly creature who can see or hear you. That creature can use its reaction to move up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks from the target of your attack.

{@italic {@bold Check.}} When you hit a creature with an attack, you can expend one battle die as a bonus action to force that creature to flee. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. A creature that is immune to being {@condition charmed} automatically succeeds on this saving throw. On a failed save, the target must immediately use its reaction, if available, to move up to half its speed directly away from you.

{@italic {@bold Flash of Brilliance.}} When you make an Intelligence or Wisdom check, you can expend one battle die to add it to the check. You can choose to use this stratagem after the ability check is rolled but before the GM says whether the result was a success or failure.

{@italic {@bold Gambit.}} When you hit a creature with an attack, you can expend one battle die to give your allies an opening. The next creature other than you to make an attack against the target adds the battle die to their attack roll.

{@italic {@bold Mystic Counsel.}} You can use a bonus action and expend one battle die to give counsel to a creature that can hear you within 30 feet of you. Once in the next minute when the creature makes a saving throw against a spell it can choose to roll the battle die and add the result to the saving throw.

{@italic {@bold Stalemate.}} When you hit a creature with an attack, you can expend one battle die as a bonus action to hold that creature in place. Until the end of its next turn, the target can't willingly move unless it first takes the Disengage action.

subclassFeature.name: Lead From The Front
entries: Starting at 7th level, you and each friendly creature within 120 feet of you that can see you ignores nonmagical difficult terrain..

subclassFeature.name: Tactical Master
entries: Starting at 10th level, friendly creatures within 10 feet of you add your Intelligence modifier to their saving throws against spells and magical effects that deal damage.

subclassFeature.name: Stratagem: Checkmate
entries: At 15th level, you learn the following stratagem:

items: {@italic {@bold Checkmate.}} When you hit a creature with a weapon or spell attack, you can use your bonus action and expend a battle die to direct one of your companions to strike. When you do so, choose a friendly creature who can see or hear you that is within reach of the creature you hit. That creature can immediately use its reaction to make one weapon attack or cast a cantrip that requires an attack roll, adding the battle die to the attack's damage roll.

subclassFeature.name: Grandmaster
entries: Beginning at 18th level, when you roll initiative, choose a number of friendly creatures up to your Intelligence modifier that can see or hear you. Each of the chosen creatures gains a battle die, without you having to expend any battle dice.

Once within the next 10 minutes, the creature can roll the die and add the number rolled to one ability check, attack roll, damage roll, or saving throw it makes. The creature can wait until after it makes the roll before deciding to add the battle die, but must decide before the GM determines the roll's outcome. Once the battle die is rolled, it is lost. A creature can have only one battle die from this feature at a time.

subclassFeature.name: House of Knights
entries: The House of Knights has a long and storied tradition of melding melee combat and swordplay with the warmage's simple spellcasting. Unlike other warriors, however, Knights carry neither swords nor shields into combat, for they can forge both out of magical force at a moment's notice.

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Proficencies
entries: When you choose this house at 3rd level, you gain proficiency with medium armor and martial weapons.

subclassFeature.name: Force Breastplate
entries: At 3rd level, plates of magical force reinforce your armor. While you are wearing light or medium armor or are under the effects of {@spell mage armor}, you can add your Intelligence modifier, instead of Dexterity, to your Armor Class.

subclassFeature.name: Mystical Weapon
entries: Also at 3rd level, you learn the {@spell force weapon|VSS} cantrip, which doesn't count against your number of cantrips known. Additionally, on your turn when you would draw a weapon, you can summon a simple or martial weapon of your choice, made entirely of magical force, to your empty hand. This weapon counts as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage. This weapon vanishes if it leaves your hand.

subclassFeature.name: Flurry of Blades
entries: Beginning at 7th level, when you cast a cantrip that allows you to make multiple spell attacks, such as {@spell force weapon|VSS} or {@spell magic daggers|VSS}, you can use your bonus action to make one additional spell attack with that cantrip.

subclassFeature.name: Knight's Ward
entries: Starting 10th level, you learn to forge a hardened magical barrier between you and your foes. As a bonus action on your turn, you can gain a number of temporary hit points equal to twice your warmage level, which last for 1 minute.
一旦你使用了这个功能，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个短期或长期的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Tactical Maneuver
entries: At 15th level, you can spend your entire movement to teleport up to half your speed to an unoccupied space you can see.

subclassFeature.name: Field of Blades
entries: Starting at 18th level, you can summon a whirlwind of mystical weapons, striking at a legion of foes in a single swipe. As an action on your turn, you can make a melee spell attack against up to five creatures you can see within 30 feet of you, with a separate attack roll for each target. On a hit, a target takes force damage equal to {@dice 2d10} + your Intelligence modifier.

subclassFeature.name: House of Lancers
entries: Warmages who join the House of Lancers are trained in fluid martial arts and meditative asceticism, melding the stoic discipline of monks with potent spellcasting. As such, they are unarmed elemental warriors, self-reliant and capable of feats no monk or warmage could hope to match. However, Lancers are notoriously neutral in almost all matters, and stand apart from the politics of the other Houses.

Lancers derive their name from an ancient precursor to the pawn, a piece remembered only in early variants of chess. Remote monasteries still play using this ancient set of rules: a smaller board, fewer pieces, and lancers replacing the dutiful pawns. It is a relic from a forgotten age, rife with symbolism.

subclassFeature.name: Intercept Technique
entries: Starting when you choose this house at 3rd level, you adopt the monastic principle of offensive protection. While you are wearing no armor and not wielding a shield, or while you are under the effects of {@spell mage armor}, you can add your Intelligence modifier, instead of Dexterity, to your Armor Class.

subclassFeature.name: Hand-To-Hand Arcana
entries: Also at 3rd level, you learn the Lancers' secret unarmed combat technique, granting you the following benefits:

items: You can use Intelligence instead of Strength for the attack and damage rolls of your unarmed strikes.
You can roll a d6 in place of the normal damage of your unarmed strikes.
Your unarmed strikes count as melee weapons for the purposes of warmage spells.

subclassFeature.name: Shock Trooper
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you can rapidly close the distance between you and your foes. Whenever you make a melee attack on your turn against a creature you can see, you can lunge up to 15 feet toward your target before making the attack. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks. You can perform this movement even if it causes you to travel through the air, though you fall after making the attack if you don't land on solid ground.

subclassFeature.name: Mystical Physicality
entries: Starting at 7th level, whenever you make a Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution check, you can use your Intelligence modifier instead of the normal modifier.
In addition, moving through difficult terrain no longer costs you additional movement.

subclassFeature.name: Deflect Energy
entries: By 10th level, you can deflect bolts of energy with your bare hands. As a reaction when you are hit by a ranged spell attack or a ranged weapon attack that deals cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, or radiant damage, you can use your reaction to deflect the bolt. The damage you take from the attack is reduced by {@dice 1d10} + your Intelligence modifier + half your warmage level (rounded down).

subclassFeature.name: Improved Shock Trooper
entries: Starting at 15th level, you can lunge up to 30 feet using your Shock Trooper feature. This movement causes you to teleport through creatures and objects, blinking to the target in an instant. You can't end your movement in an occupied space.

subclassFeature.name: Flurry of Spells
entries: Starting at 18th level, you can cast spells with superhuman speed. As an action, you can expend a use of your Arcane Surge feature to cast three different cantrips that have a casting time of 1 action or 1 bonus action. You can't use your Arcane Surge feature on any of these cantrips.
一旦你使用这个功能，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成长时间的休息。

subclassFeature.name: House of Pawns
entries: By far the most prominent warmage house is that of the Pawns. Warmages who join the House of Pawns learn to stretch their skill with cantrips to its limits. Pawns can master any cantrip or trick known to the other warmage houses, for they embody the adaptability all warmages aspire to.

subclassFeature.name: Promotion
entries: When you choose this house at 3rd level, you gain the adaptability of the quintessential warmage. You learn one warmage trick of your choice, which doesn't count against your number of warmage {@filter tricks known|optionalfeatures|feature type=T:WM}. Additionally, whenever you learn a warmage trick, you can choose a trick that has the House of Bishops, House of Kings, House of Knights, or House of Rooks as a prerequisite, as long as you meet all of the trick's other prerequisites.

subclassFeature.name: Adaptive Arcanist
entries: Also at 3rd level, you learn to emulate the spellcasting prowess of other warmages. When you finish a short or long rest, choose one warmage cantrip. You learn this cantrip, which doesn't count against the number of warmage cantrips you know, until you choose a different one with this feature.

subclassFeature.name: Pawn Storm
entries: Beginning at 7th level, if you target a creature with a cantrip, that creature can't make opportunity attacks against you for the rest of the turn, whether you deal damage with the cantrip or not.

subclassFeature.name: Additional Arcane Fighting Style
entries: At 10th level, you can choose a second option from the Arcane Fighting Style class feature.

subclassFeature.name: Opening Move
entries: Starting at 15th level, you can add your Intelligence modifier to your initiative rolls. Additionally, when you roll initiative and you aren't surprised, you can move up to your speed.

subclassFeature.name: Fundamental Mastery
entries: Starting at 18th level, your magic always finds its way to your foes' most vulnerable spots. Once per turn when you roll damage for a warmage cantrip, you can choose one damage die and treat it as having rolled its maximum value.

subclassFeature.name: House of Rooks
entries: The clandestine members of the House of Rooks make adept spies, assassins, and scouts, though they might just as easily pick up jobs run by rogues and brigands. In addition to their suite of cantrips, Rooks are light on their feet and know a few tricks to magically open doors in utter silence.

subclassFeature.name: Rook Strike
entries: Starting when you choose this house at 3rd level, as a bonus action, you can gain advantage on the next spell attack roll you make on your turn. Alternatively, you can impose disadvantage on a saving throw a creature makes against a warmage spell you cast before the end of your turn.
Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest, or until you reduce a creature to 0 hit points with a cantrip.

subclassFeature.name: Rasp
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell knock} spell at will without expending a spell slot. When you cast the spell in this way, it has a casting time of 1 minute and the spell's casting is completely silent.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Acrobat
entries: Beginning at 7th level, you can add your Intelligence modifier to all Dexterity checks you make. Additionally, when you fall and aren't incapacitated, you can subtract up to 60 feet from the fall when calculating falling damage.

subclassFeature.name: Fleeting Decoy
entries: At 10th level, as a reaction when you take damage from a creature you can see, you raise a defensive illusion to protect you from further harm. Attacks made against you have disadvantage until the start of your next turn.

subclassFeature.name: Elusive Step
entries: By 15th level, you're extremely difficult to pin down. If you move more than 15 feet on your turn, any additional movement you make doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

subclassFeature.name: Flash of Feathers
entries: Starting at 18th level, you can vanish without a trace, slip behind enemy lines, and dive in for the kill. You can cast the {@spell invisibility} spell once, targeting only yourself, without using a spell slot or spell components. While you are invisible, your speed is doubled, and you can make one attack or cast one warmage cantrip without ending the spell.
一旦你使用了这个功能，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个短期或长期的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Antiquarian
entries: Festooned with magical trinkets from every corner of the globe, antiquarians have a tool for every occasion: silver arrowheads for lycanthropes, heartwood stakes for vampires, blessed relics for fiends, and so on. As they expand their collections from piles of trinkets to veritable museums, they become adept historians and arcanists, familiar with the story of every magic item their care, as well how to use them in dire situations.

subclassFeature.name: Artifact Historian
entries: Starting when you choose this specialty at 3rd level, you add the spell {@spell identify|PHB} to your grimoire and never require material components to cast it.

subclassFeature.name: Trinkets
entries: By 3rd level, you've collected a number of magical trinkets to help you collect and unravel profound arcane secrets. You can use the following trinkets:

entries.name: Hateful Arrowhead
entries: You can cast the spell {@spell scorching ray|PHB} or {@spell ray of enfeeblement|PHB} once without using a spell slot or spell components.

entries.name: Mirrored Prism
entries: You can cast the spell {@spell blur|PHB} or {@spell mirror image|PHB}, targeting yourself only, once without using a spell slot or spell components.

entries.name: Razortooth Bandages
entries: You can cast the spell {@spell cure wounds|PHB} or {@spell inflict wounds|PHB} once without using a spell slot or spell components. This spell is cast as if using a spell slot of the level shown in the Ritual Level column of the Investigator table.

subclassFeature.name: Relics
entries: By 6th level, you've secured a handful of priceless relics with rare and delicate enchantments. You can use one of the following relics, and regain the ability to use this feature when you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Antediluvian Dynamo
entries: You can cast the spell {@spell fireball|PHB} or {@spell lightning bolt|PHB} once without using a spell slot or spell components.

entries.name: Lich's Deathmask
entries: You can cast the spell {@spell counterspell|PHB} or {@spell dispel magic|PHB} once without using a spell slot or spell components.

entries.name: Mortal Coil
entries: You can cast the spell {@spell animate dead|PHB} or {@spell revivify|PHB} once without using a spell slot or spell components. Casting {@spell animate dead|PHB} using this trinket causes all undead servants created by previous castings of the spell to revert to lifeless corpses.

subclassFeature.name: Magical Item Collection
entries: Starting at 10th level, you maintain a vault of magic items, secured in an extradimensional space with an elaborate locking mechanism. You can produce one of these items, and change your selection each day when you finish a long rest.

The item is your choice of the following: a {@item carpet of flying|DMG}, a {@item cloak of the bat|DMG}, a {@item flame tongue|DMG}, {@item gauntlets of ogre power|DMG}, an {@item instant fortress|DMG}, a {@item ring of regeneration|DMG}, a {@item ring of telekinesis|DMG}, a {@item sun blade|DMG}, or a {@item wand of wonder|PHB}.

subclassFeature.name: Phylactery
entries: By 14th level, you've secured the crown jewel of your collection: a lich's phylactery. Though the original owner's soul has been expelled from this accursed artifact, it retains many of its unique properties.

This magic item is always attuned to you and doesn't count against your total number of attuned magic items. It has 5 charges, and regains {@dice 1d4 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. You can expend one or more of these charges to use the following abilities:

entries.name: 1 Charge:
entries: You can cast the spell {@spell false life|PHB} as a second level spell without expending spell slots or spell components.

entries.name: 1 Charge:
entries: You can use your bonus action to regain an expended use of your Trinkets.

entries.name: 2 Charges:
entries: As a reaction when you drop to 0 hit points, you can drop to 1 hit point instead.

entries.name: 3 Charges:
entries: Make a melee spell attack against creature within your reach. On a hit, the target takes {@dice 5d6} necrotic damage and you regain hit points equal to the total amount of necrotic damage dealt.

subclassFeature.name: Archivist
entries: Though most investigators fill their grimoires with hard-won knowledge borne from encounters with the supernatural threats, some prefer to do bookkeeping instead. Such archivists accrue knowledge, not trinkets, by spending untold hours digging through disparate tomes of occult knowledge and compiling them into encyclopedic texts on the supernatural. Through their research, archivists become academic masters of the arcane, and priceless reservoirs of obscure knowledge.

subclassFeature.name: Trinket
entries: Starting when you choose this specialization at 3rd level, you've collected a powerful trinket to enhance your ritual magic:

entries.name: Archaic Scroll
entries: You can perform a ritual spell with your Rushed Incantation feature without expending one of the feature's uses.

subclassFeature.name: Thesis
entries: Also at 3rd level, you gain access to certain spells associated with your thesis. Pick one of the following subject areas for your thesis: Corpus, Ignis, Mortis, or Regis. You gain a list of associated thesis spells. Once you gain access to a thesis spell, it is added to your grimoire. If you gain access to a spell that doesn't appear on the investigator ritual list, the spell is nonetheless an investigator spell for you. You can use your action and expend a use of your Rushed Incantation feature to cast one of your thesis spells.

subclassFeature.name: Erudite Spell
entries: By 6th level, you've mastered the difficult theory behind arcane propagation. When you cast a spell which forces a creature to make a saving throw to resist its effects, you can give one target of the spell disadvantage on its first saving throw against the spell.
一旦你使用这个能力，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个短期或长期休息。

subclassFeature.name: Encyclopedic Expertise
entries: Starting at 10th level, you can identify any arcane effect from memory. Whenever you witness a spell being cast or investigate a magical effect, you can always identify the spell that was cast, the magic item responsible, or the monster which produced the effect. However, this ability fails to identify spells, magic items, and monsters which are utterly unique or are otherwise not recorded in arcane texts.

subclassFeature.name: Eidetic Memory
entries: At 14th level, you can effortlessly duplicate spells you see in the world. You can copy any ritual spell you see being cast into your grimoire.

Moreover, you can precisely copy the exact motions of a spell's casting to duplicate its effect. When you see a spell of 5th level or lower being cast, you can use your action and spend 1 use of your Rushed Incantation feature as an action to cast the spell yourself without spending a spell slot. The spell must have a casting time of 1 action, must not have expensive spell components, and must have taken place within the last minute to use this ability.
Once you duplicate a spell in this way, you can't duplicate it again until you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Detective
entries: Prowling at the edge of darkness, detectives chase down clues and pull on threads to unravel conspiracies which bring darkness into the world. Sometimes, this requires that you infiltrate a cult's secret meetings, other times it calls on you to reconstruct a man's last moments at a murder scene, but no matter what the mystery, you know that there is always an explanation.

subclassFeature.name: Investigator's Hunch
entries: Starting when you choose this specialization at 3rd level, you can unravel even the toughest of mysteries. If you spend at least 10 minutes combing through documents and arranging clues, you can make an Intelligence check with advantage.

subclassFeature.name: Trinkets
entries: By 3rd level, you've collected a number of magical trinkets to aid you in tracking supernatural creatures and unraveling mysteries. You can use the following trinkets:

entries.name: Glass Medalion
entries: As a bonus action, you can cast the spell {@spell invisibility|PHB}, targeting yourself only, once without using a spell slot or spell components.

entries.name: Fogstone Periapt
entries: As a bonus action, you can cast the spell {@spell misty step|PHB} once without using a spell slot or spell components.

entries.name: Skeleton's Key
entries: As a bonus action, you can cast the spell {@spell knock|PHB} once without using a spell slot or spellcomponents.

subclassFeature.name: Predictive Intuition
entries: By 6th level, you can turn your skills at reconstructing events towards anticipating the next likely moment of a fight. As a bonus action, you can examine the movements of a creature you can see within 30 feet. You can choose to add {@dice 1d4} to your next attack roll targeting that creature before the start of your next turn, or you can choose to subtract {@dice 1d4} from the creature's next attack roll against you before the start of your next turn.

subclassFeature.name: Interrogator's Instinct
entries: At 10th level, you are so accustomed to uncovering the truth that you can sense the intents behind someone's voice. You can tell if a creature that you can hear speaking is charmed, possessed, or otherwise enchanted to speak against their will, and you have advantage on any ability check you make to determine if you hear a lie.

subclassFeature.name: Power of Deduction
entries: Starting at 14th level, you can use your action to examine a creature you can see within 30 feet, taking note of innumerable details and making a lengthy string of logical deductions. For the next minute, you have advantage on Intelligence and Charisma checks you make to interact with this creature, and you have advantage on attack rolls against them.
一旦你使用这个能力，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个短期或长期休息。

subclassFeature.name: Exterminator
entries: An exterminator suffers no monster to live. Trained in the art of slaying aberrations, fiends, and undead, you stand against evil where others falter, and draw your blade before others recognize a threat. Grand schemes and plots are less important than retribution against those monsters which stalk the night, and your thirst for such retribution is unquenchable. There is always another werewolf to be slain, another vampire to be staked, another demon to be banished; people rarely thank you, but you find satisfaction enough in your work.

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Proficiencies
entries: Starting when you choose this specialization at 3rd level, you gain proficiency with martial weapons and medium armor.

subclassFeature.name: Trinkets
entries: By 3rd level, you've collected a number of magical trinkets to aid you in the elimination of monsters and other fiendish threats. You can use the following trinkets:

entries.name: Concecrated Whetstone
entries: As a bonus action, you can cast the spell {@spell magic weapon|PHB} once without using a spell slot or spell components.

entries.name: Gilded Dragon Scale
entries: As a bonus action, you gain resistance to one damage type of your choice for a minute.

entries.name: Wyverntooth Necklace
entries: When you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, you can use your bonus action to activate this trinket, dealing an additional {@dice 2d6} acid damage to the creature.

subclassFeature.name: Monster Slayer
entries: Beginning at 6th level, when you use the Attack action, you can make one weapon attack as a bonus action. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Intelligence modifier (a minimum of once) and regain all expended uses when you finish a short or long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Silvered Edge
entries: Starting at 10th level, whenever you deal damage to a creature with a weapon attack, it can't regain hit points until the start of your next turn. Additionally, when you reduce a creature to 0 hit points, it can't be raised as an undead creature nor be returned to life for 7 days.

subclassFeature.name: Killer Instinct
entries: Starting at 14th level, you can use your Exploit Vulnerability feature twice on your turn, but can't use it against the same target more than once.

subclassFeature.name: Inquisitor
entries: The church has long been the first line of defense against the tide of impending darkness. Yet, the clergy's stubborn devotion to righteousness impedes them where it counts: you must sometimes be willing to do evil to counter evil. That's where the inquisition comes in.

As a righteous inquisitor of the faith, you are tasked with rooting out heresy, exorcising demons, and stamping out any sign of the occult, and are offered clemency for any action you take in the defense of the greater good. You may investigate anyone or anything you deem to be in line with the forces of evil, for you alone are a holy blade in the dark, the arbiter of your church.

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Proficiencies
entries: Starting when you choose this specialization at 3rd level, you gain proficiency with medium armor

subclassFeature.name: Exorcist's Doctrines
